titleStmt.title: Aulicus coquinariæ or a vindication in ansvver to a pamphlet, entituled The court and character of King James. Pretended to be penned by Sir A.W. and published since his death, 1650.
titleStmt.author: Sanderson, William, Sir, 1586?-1676.
Heylyn, Peter, 1660-1662, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Seile, over against St. Dunstans Church in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: A reply to the work by Sir Anthony Weldon.
Running title reads: Aulicus coquinariæ: or the character &c.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Henry Seile, over against St. Dunstans Church
